General.Name: INFOMARK Co. Ltd
General.Description: INFOMARK Co., Ltd provides wearable communication devices for kids in South Korea and internationally. It offers wearable phones; 4G/5G products, such as IML products, including mobile routers; internet of things; and artificial intelligence speakers. The company also operates EduTech platform business. INFOMARK Co., Ltd was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
